definition: to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: For any whom Allah leaves astray, there is no protector thereafter.
sentences.chinese: 真主使誰迷誤，在真主的棄絕後，誰沒有任何保護者。

sentences.english: God has not promised to meet the needs of people who reject His Son.
sentences.chinese: 對那些棄絕他兒子的人，神沒應許滿足他們的需用。

sentences.english: Asahara's group has renamed itself "Aleph," and says it has renounced violence.
sentences.chinese: 麻原彰晃現在已經改名，並且表示已棄絕暴力。

sentences.english: We repent, we abjure, we will break from our chain.
sentences.chinese: 我們懺悔，棄絕，要把鎖鏈打破。

sentences.english: People are without spiritual discipline and prayer, without renunciation and dispassion.
sentences.chinese: 人們沒有進行禱告和靈性訓練，沒有棄絕和冷靜。

sentences.english: He had been impressed by their devotion and purity, their self-control and renunciation.
sentences.chinese: 他被他們的熱情和純潔，自制和棄絕所吸引。

sentences.english: The real trap, however, is self-rejection.
sentences.chinese: 真正的陷阱，是自我棄絕。

sentences.english: God has not rejected his people whom he foreknew .
sentences.chinese: 神並沒有棄絕他預先所知道的百姓。

sentences.english: God did not reject his people, whom he foreknew .
sentences.chinese: 上帝並沒有棄絕他預先所知道的百姓。

sentences.english: Put away from thee a froward mouth, and perverse lips put far from thee.
sentences.chinese: 你要除掉邪僻的口，棄絕乖謬的嘴。

sentences.english: But first must he suffer many things, and be rejected of this generation.
sentences.chinese: 只是他必須先受許多苦，又被這世代棄絕。

sentences.english: You’re not seeing Him dying for you that means God does not reject you, Jesus was rejected for you.
sentences.chinese: 你尚未明白祂爲你受死意味着上帝不會將你棄絕。

sentences.english: If he really feels that kind of dispassion , he renounces home and family.
sentences.chinese: 如果他真的感覺到那種冷靜，他會棄絕住宅和家庭。

sentences.english: Their entry into the war made them cross the Rubicon and abandon isolationism forever.
sentences.chinese: 他們的參戰使他們破釜沉舟永遠棄絕孤立主義。

sentences.english: And that basically, you can delay technology, but you can't kill it.
sentences.chinese: 那基本上你可以延遲科技，而無法棄絕它。

sentences.english: Worse than being ignored, this behaviour is spurned.
sentences.chinese: 比被忽略更糟糕的是，這種行爲是將我們棄絕不顧。

definition: to praise the virtue of sb or sth while concealing their faults
to be reluctant to give up a post
to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
